title: In Monsoon Session, Cong to oppose 3 Bills, raise Manipur issue, Centre’s ‘assault’ on federalism
selftext: The party is set to demand resignation of Union Home Minister Amit Shah over the violence in Manipur
comments: Finally opposition getting their act together.

I guess the monsoon session will be cancelled and on the last day, all bills will be passed without discussion. Or if the opposition actually succeeds in raising issues, their statements will be removed from the hemisphere.
They don't need to cancel, the honourable speaker will just enter, smile, pass everything without looking at the opposition and adjourn.
